mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T10_RELATIONSHIP ( PER_NO , FATHER_NO , MOTHER_NO , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME , LAST_USER , LAST_DATE , LAST_TIME ) VALUES ( #{PerNo} , #{FatherNo} , #{MotherNo} , #{CreateUser} , #{CreateDate} , #{CreateTime} , #{LastUser} , curdate() , curtime() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T10_RELATIONSHIP SET PER_NO = #{PerNo} , FATHER_NO = #{FatherNo} , MOTHER_NO = #{MotherNo} , CREATE_USER = #{CreateUser} , CREATE_DATE = #{CreateDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{CreateTime} , LAST_USER = #{LastUser} , LAST_DATE = curdate() , LAST_TIME = curtime() WHERE ID = #{Id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "Id" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , FATHER_NO AS "FatherNo" , MOTHER_NO AS "MotherNo" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T10_RELATIONSHIP WHERE ID = #{Id}

SELECT ID AS "Id" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , FATHER_NO AS "FatherNo" , MOTHER_NO AS "MotherNo" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T10_RELATIONSHIP WHERE ID = #{Id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "Id" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , FATHER_NO AS "FatherNo" , MOTHER_NO AS "MotherNo" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T10_RELATIONSHIP WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
